messages.title: App Feedback
messages.message: We would love to hear your feedback so now we ask you about how you would rate the platform_name app.

messages.title: App Feedback
messages.message: We would love to hear your feedback so now we ask you about how you would rate the platform_name app.

messages.title: All Courses Available on Mobile
messages.message: We've heard you! All courses on platform_name will now be available on mobile.

messages.title: Transcript for Videos
messages.message: If subtitles are available for a video, it will be shown as a scrollable transcript below the video.

messages.title: Video Player Improvements
messages.message: The video player now goes into full screen as soon as device is rotated to landscape. Full screen videos can easily be swiped to move to next units.
